Class SystemController

java.lang.Object
controller.SystemController
public class SystemController extends Object
Central system controller. Manages user authentication, session, and initializes all controllers and data. Coordinates loading and saving of: - Students - CareerCenterStaff - CompanyRepresentatives - Internships - Applications - WithdrawRequests

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SystemController()
    Constructor initializes all controllers and sets up singleton-like references.

  • Method Details

    • authenticateUser

      public Object authenticateUser(String id, String password)
      Authenticate user by ID and password. Returns User object, FALSE for wrong password, null if not found.
